info.title: Wamumbi Charity Management API
info.description: Type-safe API for charity management. This documentation is auto-generated from tRPC procedures with OpenAPI metadata.

post.description: Validates Clerk authentication and returns current user data

get.description: Returns the currently authenticated Clerk user
Retrieves overall statistics for the dashboard
Retrieves upcoming events for the dashboard
Retrieves active campaigns for the dashboard
Retrieves active projects for the dashboard
Retrieves donation trends for the last 12 months
Retrieves performance metrics for recent campaigns
Retrieves a specific campaign by its ID
Retrieves a specific donation by its ID

post.description: Creates a new donor or returns existing one

get.description: Retrieves all active recurring donation frequencies
Retrieves all available currencies for donations
Retrieves a brief overview of teams for dashboard display
Retrieves a specific team by its ID

post.description: Adds a new member to a team

delete.description: Removes a member from a team

put.description: Updates a team member role or status

get.description: Retrieves a specific event by its ID

post.description: Registers a user for an event

get.description: Retrieves a specific volunteer by their ID

post.description: Creates a new user and volunteer record in one transaction
Logs a new activity for a volunteer

get.description: Retrieves all blog posts with details
Retrieves a specific blog post by its ID

delete.description: Deletes a blog post by ID

get.description: Retrieves all active blog post statuses

post.description: Submits a partnership inquiry from the website form and sends an email notification
